title: Outlook For Semiconductors, Domestic Chip Production
itunes:title: Outlook For Semiconductors, Domestic Chip Production
description:
Hans Albrecht, VP, Portfolio Manager and Options Strategist at Horizons ETF Management, talks semiconductors. Kara Murphy, CIO of Kestra Holdings, discusses markets and ESG investing. Robert Schmidt, Financial Regulation Reporter for Bloomberg News, talks about his Big Take story, "SEC's Gensler Readies More Crypto Oversight to Protect Investors." Dan Genter, President, CEO and CIO of RNC Genter Capital Management, discusses market trends. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller. (Kailey Leinz fills in for Paul Sweeney)

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
